summary: Whenever I feel low or like I'm coming down with something I feel the need to surround myself with fluffy things and dress in as...
body: Whenever I feel low or like I’m coming down with something I feel the need to surround myself with fluffy things and dress in as much Harry Potter (or other fandom, but really HP is #1 here) clothing as possible and I’m happy to say that I’m now dressed exclusively in Harry Potter and cuddling my fuzzy Hedwig water bottle

blog.name: bounding-heart
blog.title: Harry Potter Oriented Things
blog.description: Gryffindor, bi-sexual, old, feminist, over-emotional and unashamed, anti-antis. Love=J K Rowling, Cursed Child, Fantastic Beasts, Drarry, Hinny, Scorbus, Romione, Harry James Potter, Expect meta. Lots and lots of Harry Potter meta. It's a good idea to read my 'about me' before following. Only over 18s, please.

title: The Thestrals Nursery Rhyme
body:
I’ve been changing the settings on my A03 account to public and adding Bounding-Heart as a pseud. Which means I’ve been revisiting all my old fics. It’s such a trip. I’ve written some pretty messed up stuff. XD

I wrote this wizarding nursery rhyme in 2006. It was the second fanwork I created. Warnings for character death?

by Bounding-Heart (Brief_and_Dreamy)

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your brother thinks flying is so much fun;
He crashes his broom, and that makes one.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your daddy catches dragon pox, but what can you do?
Pop him in a box, and that makes two.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your sister takes a stroll by a Guillotine Tree,
It lops off her head, and that makes three

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your mummy hears the Dark Lord at the door,
“Avada Kedavra!” That makes four.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your uncle thinks the Manticore’s not alive;
It turns out it is, and that makes five.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
You Aunty drops her wand while levitating bricks;
Scrape her off the ground, and that makes six.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your cousin’s hunting Piskies in Cornwall and Devon;
They lure her off a cliff, and that makes seven.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your son gets to King’s Cross Station late;
He falls under the train, and that makes eight.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
Your daughter sneaks a sip of nettle wine;
It’s tainted with poison, and that makes nine.

Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee, Fiddle-dee-dee,
How many Thestrals can you see?
All of this grief sends you mad, my friend;
You slit your own throat, and that’s the end.

blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

title: Angel for Demon
description:
by summerkiss4869

他的笑容还挂在脸上，却是不知道怎么的，在这样一个黑发白肤，五官精致的孩子脸上，这样的笑容却有些让人毛骨悚然的意味。
在昏暗的灯光下远远看去，简直就像是一个恶魔。
不过，汤姆也不在乎别人怎么说他。恶魔也好，怪物也好，怪胎也好。
反正，他知道自己拥有一个天使。
从那天起，他才开始真正确信，他是不一样的，他是一个特别的人，他值得天使为他而来，他值得一个更好的未来，他值得一个更好、更绚烂的世界。

Words: 11971, Chapters: 1/1, Language: 中文

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Tom Riddle | Voldemort
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Voldemort, Harry Potter/Tom Riddle
  • Additional Tags: 黑暗向短篇一发完, 天使哈利, 主汤姆视角, 强占有欲!汤姆, 大量私设, 半开放式结局

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

blog.name: reducto-bitch
blog.title: FUCK ME DRARRY

summary:
in a slytherdor group chat:
draco: i'm watching this really dumb show called riverdale and the girls are hot and stuff but i am...
body:
in a slytherdor group chat:

draco: i’m watching this really dumb show called riverdale and the girls are hot and stuff but i am not turned on at all

draco: like at all

ron: tmi

draco: shut up het

hermione: i didn’t know you were gay, draco

harry: lol that’s the only thing i will ever agree with from malfoy

draco: so you’re gay too?

harry: bisexuals exist, you fuck

draco: geez okay

pansy: what’s ur preference pottAH

harry: not into black haired ppl, sorry

ginny: it’s obviously ginger, eh ;)

harry: no not redheads either

ron: lmao gins get rekt

ginny: fuck off

hermione: blondies?

harry: idk maybe

pansy: ha, knew it

blaise: wtf is happening why is draco burying his face in his pillow

blaise: ears red n all

blaise: what did u do potter

harry: i did nothing??

pansy: potter just confirmed he likes blondies

pansy: also he said hes bi when i’m sure he’s lying he’s just gay

harry: @pansy >:(

harry: what’s that got to do with malfoy?

ron: you’re pretty fucking slow for the chosen one, huh

hermione: oh, harry. when will you ever get it

ron: okay what the fuck did malfoy do that harry is now red as hell

ron: mALFOY ANSWER ME YA DUMB BITCH

draco: tf u want

ron: wHAT DID YOU DO TO HARRY

draco: i didn’t do anything

harry: guys

harry: i uhhh

harry: think i’m gay

pansy: for?

ron: for?

hermione: for who?

blaise: for who

harry removed draco from the chat

harry: for malfoy..

blaise: lmao knew it

ron: congratulations you are the last one to know

pansy added draco to the chat

pansy: harry potter over here admitted something

pansy: wanna repeat it? @harry

harry: i didn’t admit anything

hermione sent a photo

hermione: there ya go. some fucking proof

draco: i uh

draco: i think

draco: @harry please private message me :)

ron: r y'all gonna sext or smtg

blaise: probably HAH

title: Candy Hearts

anna. multi-fandom, 30 and ancient, studying English, askbox always open, graphic designer, lover of UK, Doctor Who and Sex Education ❤
#emmasmeckey
my edits | my gifs

MY BABYS
@sexeducationsource

summary: looking for cool shit to follow
title: looking for cool shit to follow
body:
So, here’s the deal - I love Sex Education. It totally knocked me out of left field and I cannot get enough of it. So after a tumblr-break I now need, need, need to be on tumblr again to squee and fangirl and do all that shit. I also like some other stuff and I do graphics.

So I am looking for:

  • People and/or blogs that love Sex Education or its actors in all its vibrant glory
  • People that love the MCU
  • People who love Doctor Who
  • Also people who love Sex Ed … did I mention that?
  • People that love Harry Potter
  • Sex Ed?
  • Other super snazzy cool graphic artists
  • Some super smart good-fight fighters that blog about social issues would be awesome, too!
  • And just … whoever are the coolest people you know xD SHOW ME ALL YOUR COOL PEEPS!

blog.name: the-ninjago-to-hogwarts
blog.title: A Ninjago/Hogwarts Ask Blog
blog.description: The au in which the ninja are actually hogwarts students. Ask them anything you want!

summary: So how does it work with Misako and Koko being two seperate people?
question: So how does it work with Misako and Koko being two seperate people?
answer: Due to wanting to encourperatd ideas from both the movie and the show I really couldn’t decide which style Misako to go with so I just eventually decided to keep them seperate because they are nearly essentially already different characters especially with how koko is I’m pretty sure never called misako in the movie. Misako seems older in the show and koko is a much stronger motherly presence with a much more emotional personality whilst Misako is a older wiser and a little more hardened. So for this au Misako and Koko are sisters Misako is Lloyd’s mum and Koko is his cool aunt.

summary: The Wizarding World is a dangerous place! The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the...
caption:
The Wizarding World is a dangerous place!

The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the shadows as the Dark Lord Voldemort grows ever more powerful. His followers, the Death Eaters, wreak havoc at his behest, striking fear into even the bravest of hearts. But there are those who refuse to give into the darkness. Albus Dumbledore, Headmaster of Hogwarts, leads the Order of the Phoenix, a secret society of courageous witches and wizards determined to battle back against Voldemort’s forces.

The First Wizarding War was never cut and dry, though. Each side comprised of more than simple heroes and villains. They were people, who lived and loved and fought and died. Each had a life and each had a story. What side will you pick and whose story will you tell?

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Our Most Wanted Characters include:

  • James Potter
  • Lily Potter
  • Bellatrix Lestrange
  • Amycus Carrow

And Many MORE!

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

trail.content_raw:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

summary:
Ron: Just one shot of firewhiskey, Hermione.
Hermione: How do you expect me to drink this if I can’t even take a sip of fizzing...
body:
Ron: Just one shot of firewhiskey, Hermione.

Hermione: How do you expect me to drink this if I can’t even take a sip of fizzing Sprite right after it’s been opened without it feeling like hot acid is burning through my lungs?

reblog.comment:
Ron: Just one shot of firewhiskey, Hermione.

Hermione: How do you expect me to drink this if I can’t even take a sip of fizzing Sprite right after it’s been opened without it feeling like hot acid is burning through my lungs?
